desc: I am looking for a Adsense expert that can make a site that generates US$40 - US$50 or more per day. I would need your suggestion of the blog.Points to be noted:• MUST earn US$40 – US$50 per day• Has to be Adsense optimized• The traffic has to be 100% humans (No Bots, Paid Traffic, etc )• Traffic should be steady for for the life time of the site• Additional post has to be unique• You can choose the niche but no Adult, Pharmaceuticals, Violence or Gambling• Must 100% adhere Google TOSAll copyrights will be assigned to me in writing. Must contain related images to niche topic. Design must be neat and optimised to attract people to click on the adsI will provide the domain and the hosting but you have to choose the domain name, also I will provide the Adsense account and a Google Analytics account. If you require anything else, don't hesitate to ask.I will pay the amount of bid only AFTER I see constant income in my Adsense account. I will hold the payment for 45 days until this has been confirmed. SORRY - No partial payments! When conditions have been met successfully, you will be paid in full.The bidder should consider the following points:• Tell me how will you direct and increase traffic to the website.• Show us proof of income for 30 days on any of your previous projects (Unique Visitor, Unique Clicks, Ad Clicked, Text-Ads clicked)• Show me some of your previous website/blogs that you already created (that must not be your own)Have to stress again - the website, traffic and ad clicks must be 100% within Adsense TOS. I cannot risk my Adsense [url removed, login to view] AND CLICKS MUST BE WHITE-HAT ONLY.Only experience bidders with a proven record will be considered.If I am satisfied with the work I will hire you again for few similar projects as this one.
title: Adsense Website which can generate $40 - $50 per day
